name: Senior ML Engineer (Generative AI)
description: BP Mobile (AIBY Group) is an industry-leading company that develops and publishes mobile-first products using cutting-edge innovations. Our top apps include iScanner, FindMe, Second Phone Number, and Smart Cleaner. The products constantly hit the charts and push their categories forward. Since the company's founding, we have grown to 300+ employees spread across the globe with a user base of over 500 million people, and we continue to proliferate as a team. We welcome professionals who share our belief in technology and its ability to empower people! To further expand our horizons and achieve even bigger results in a number of fields, we’re looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our team. What tasks need to be performed:   Optimization of deep neural networks for fast inference (distillation, quantization, research of new architectures, etc.).   Training and fine-tuning of multi-modal diffusion models using custom datasets.   Deployment of generative models using various inference engines like TensorRT, AITemplates, and CoreML.   Work in tandem with the Engineering Team and visualize and report results of your research to the Product Team.   Tech stack: Inference Engines & deploy:   TensorRT + NVidia Triton Server + FastAPI;   AITemplate + Lightning (FastAPI) + RabbitMQ;   CoreML - will be a plus.   ML frameworks:   PyTorch + JAX;   huggingface: diffusers, transformers, tokenizers;   ML/DL approaches:   Distillation, quantization;   Diffusion Models;   Generative Adversarial Networks (adversarial training, perceptual loss);   Super Resolution;   Traditional Computer Vision: object detection, classification, semantic segmentation ( will be a plus).   You are a good fit for this role if you:   Have at least 5 years of experience with Python and 3 years of experience with Pytorch ;   Demonstrate on-hands experience with the development process in DL and ML (Docker, git, TensorBoard, DVC, Weights & Biases);   Have experience with a similar stack;   Prove English proficiency of at least B1   Will be a plus:   Public activity on Kaggle, GitHub, Leetcode or Social media.   Software development background.   At least B1 level of Belarussian/Ukrainian/Russian   What we offer:   A variety of unique projects;   Independent decision-making and no meaningless paperwork;   A chance to influence the development of our products directly;   English courses;   Sports reimbursement program;   Compensation of psychological counseling;   Reimbursement of expenses for professional courses and trainings;   A variety of corporate events and team-building activities;   Medical insurance and assistance (depends on the location);   25 calendar days of paid vacation;   5 sick days and other benefits.We look forward to getting to know you!)
